title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.9 - Cargo facilities, definition of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1243.9 - Cargo facilities, definition of

State Regulations
(a) Public cargo facilities. The cargo
buildings and open areas at a marine terminal designated by the Port Authority
for the handling of waterborne cargo and the holding of such cargo for further
transportation. (b) Leased cargo
facilities. The cargo buildings and open areas at a marine terminal operated by
firms, corporations, partnerships or individuals under agreements with the Port

Authority and designated by the Port Authority from time to time for the
holding of waterborne cargo for further transportation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1243.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
